document_data.name: Markguth
document_data.mainbody: '''Markguth''' was a [[human]] guard and the sergeant of the guards in the small town of [[Greenest]], located in the [[Western Heartlands]] in [[west Faer√ªn]].
document_data.History: During the battle with the [[Cult of the Dragon]], Markguth was among the defenders of the keep. When he saw that [[Langdedrosa Cyanwrath]] had captured his sister and her children, he offered to be the city's champion against the [[half-dragon]].
